dc:title: Our Country Passes from Undeclared War to Declared War; We Continue Our Christian Pacifist Stand
dc:author: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A month after Pearl Harbor she reaffirms the gospel basis of pacifism. Says she will not be carping in her criticism of our country but refuses to participate in war. Recommends constant prayer, the works of mercy, and mutual forbearance in disagreements.
